text: I disingannati (The Undeceived) is a comic opera in three acts composed by Antonio Caldara to an Italian libretto by Giovanni Claudio Pasquini based on Molière's play Le Misanthrope. It premiered on 8 February 1729 at the court theater in Vienna.Gelli, Piero (ed.) (2005). Dizionario dell'opera 2006, pp. 318–319. Baldini Castoldi Dalai. Amongst its revivals in modern times was the 1993 production at the Innsbruck Festival of Early Music conducted by Sigiswald Kuijken.Innsbruck Festival of Early Music Archives. I disinagnnati. Retrieved 16 July 2016. ==References== Category:Operas Category:1729 operas Category:Italian-language operas Category:Operas by Antonio Caldara
title: I disingannati
